name: Golf Orbit
description: Golf Orbit is an exciting golf simulator game where you aim to launch golf balls to incredible heights, even reaching Mars. Have fun in one-shot golf battles and master the perfect shot.
howToPlay:
The key to Golf Orbit is to aim and hit the golf ball as far as possible. This one-button game has relatively easy gameplay, but getting that perfect shot can be challenging. Tap and hold your left mouse to set the power and release to hit the ball. As the ball soars, it bounces off various objects, gaining extra distance. Your distance will be recorded with each shot, keeping you accountable for your progress. The goal is to achieve the longest distance possible with each swing.

Collect Rewards

Collect coins during the flight to upgrade your equipment and improve your shots. The goal is to achieve the longest distance possible with each swing. Points can be accumulated in various ways. The longer the distance you shoot, the more points you get. You can also unlock points with a surprise spin,

There are three elements to a perfect shot: strength, speed, and bounce. You can give each one of these a boost with reward points.

name: Dalgona Candy Honeycomb Cookie
description: Dalgona Candy Honeycomb Cookie is a fun, shape-carving challenge where you'll carefully cut out designs from honeycomb cookies. With levels that feature classic dalgona and American cookies.
howToPlay: Use the left mouse button to play.

name: Lumber Harvest: Tree Cutting Game
description: Lumber Harvest is a relaxing progression game where you drive a tractor to clear forests and collect timber. Upgrade your saw, expand your truck's capacity, and unlock new areas.
howToPlay: Use the WASD/Arrow keys to move your tractor and collect logs, or use the left mouse button to drag in any direction to drive your tractor and harvest trees.

name: Count Masters: Stickman Games
description: Count Masters is a fast-paced running game where you gather a growing army of stickmen to clash against rival crowds. Navigate obstacles and multiply your numbers to win.
howToPlay:
Mouse = Move the character by moving the mouse left or right. Left-click to select buttons.
Keyboard = Use the left and right arrow keys to move. Press space to select actions.

name: Capybara Clicker
description: Capybara Clicker is a clicker game where you multiply the capybara population by clicking. Buy upgrades to increase capybara output, change weather, and unlock new skins.
howToPlay: Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI.

description: 2048 is an addictive number puzzle game where you combine matching tiles to create the number 2048. Slide tiles in four directions, merging identical numbers to double their value.
howToPlay: Use arrow keys or swipe to move all tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one with their sum. Try to reach the 2048 tile!

name: Snake.io
description: Snake.io is a multiplayer snake game where you control a colorful snake and compete against other players. Eat glowing orbs to grow longer and eliminate opponents.
howToPlay: Use your mouse or arrow keys to control your snake. Eat the glowing dots to grow longer and avoid colliding with other snakes or the border.

name: City Builder
description: City Builder is a strategic simulation game where you design and manage your own thriving metropolis. Start with a small town and expand it into a bustling city.
howToPlay: Click on the building icons in the menu to select structures, then click on the grid to place them. Manage resources shown at the top of the screen and ensure balanced development.

name: Basketball Stars
description: Basketball Stars is a fast-paced sports game where you play one-on-one basketball matches against the computer or friends. Choose from various players with unique abilities.
howToPlay: Use the arrow keys to move your player. Press Z to shoot and X to jump/block. Time your shots perfectly for the best chance to score.

name: Parkour Race
description: Parkour Race is an exhilarating action game where you run, jump, and slide through challenging obstacle courses. Race against opponents and reach the finish line first.
howToPlay: Press space to jump, C to slide, and use the arrow keys to move left or right. Time your jumps perfectly to overcome obstacles.
